mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (user_identification, user_password, user_name, user_address, user_birth, user_phone, user_email) values(#{userIdentification},#{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select user_identification from tbl_user where user_identification = #{userIdentification}
select user_email from tbl_user where user_email = #{userEmail}
select user_id from tbl_user where user_identification = #{userIdentification} and user_password = #{userPassword}
